message.name: ERR_MISSING_REOPEN_REASON
message.locale: The reason for the Program Reopen must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_REOPEN_DATE
message.locale: The date for the Program Reopen must be entered.

message.name: ERR_REOPEN_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_BEFORE_PROGRAM_COMPLETION_DATE
message.locale: Date must be on or after the Completed Date for the program %1s.

message.name: ERR_REOPEN_DATE_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Date must be on or before todays date.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_WITH_APPLICATION_CASE
message.locale: This program is already associated with the application case.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_ALREADY_AUTHORIZED_WITH_APPLICATION_CASE
message.locale: The program has already been authorized on the application case.
The program has already been authorised on the application case.
